statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -2 \\ 3 \\ 1 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 2 \\ -2 \\ 1 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 8 \\ -9 \\ 2 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 5 \\ -8 \\ 7 \\ -6 \\ 19 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -4 \\ -1 \\ 0 \\ -2 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
